page.title: 19FARMING (4)
page.content: dairy replacements. They have 2{dogs}, 5{ducks.}The ducks have got their wings clipped so they won't fly away. There is a stream that runs through the farm land that divides the parishes of Halberton and Uplowman.Mr Britton has all kinds of machinery such as: tractors, combine, ploughs, roller, manure spreaders ,spinner, trailers, forrage ,harvester, etc. Mr Britton and his son work on the farm, they also employ 2 full time workers. 4 people live in the actual farmhouse. There are 3 cottages on the farm. 3 people live in cottage 1,3 people live in cottage 2 and 2 people live in cottage 3.
